thread.title_full: Freeze Pro Shop reviewed by Andy Logan

author: Andy Logan
title: Andy Logan
text: It was a little too easy to order my new Oakley lens from Freeze Pro Shop. I used the next day courier service (having ordered before 12pm) for ~Â£5 to ensure it arrived in time for my holiday and the item had arrived by 9am the next day by DHL. Not bad going from Scotland to Coventry. Would definitely use again, next time might test the standard delivery option. Thanks Freeze Pro Shop.
